nodes.text: tackling the problem can prove complex.
After 70 years of communism they don t always understand or appreciate the concept of intellectual property rights
If in some countries it is the mentality and the state that support piratery the problem is hard to tackle
In China 95% of movies get pirated
The best explanation for the piratery is the communism
The  kind woman at the top  told Lutz:  I don t see what the problem is.
In this case the counterfeit was for these people and for the government completly legal
A Chinese manufacturer dropped a reproduced frame of a Jeep Cherokee onto the chassis of a Soviet pickup then externally adorned it with real chrome parts from California Jeep dealers
As we understand capitalism if someone makes a product better than you and cheaper they deserve the market.
Our government is not about to crack down on local business manufacturers.
If something respects the rules of capitalism and the statal laws it is legal
